title: 群组服炸了

replies.author: Ariy
replies.txt_content: 子服设置了正版登陆，在server.properties中将online-mode 改为false

replies.author: MC_tingfeng
replies.txt_content: 你的子服开了正版验证，关了即可     在server.properties 里面，找到online-mode=true    将true改为false
